org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.sampling

Class PageRankSampling

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.sampling.SamplingAlgorithm
      • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.sampling.PageRankSampling
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operator, UnaryGraphToGraphOperator, UnaryGraphToValueOperator<LogicalGraph>

    public class PageRankSampling
extends SamplingAlgorithm
    Computes a PageRank-Sampling of the graph. Uses the Gradoop-Wrapper of Flinks PageRank-algorithm PageRank with a dampening factor and a number of maximum iterations. It computes a per-vertex score which is the sum of the PageRank-scores transmitted over all in-edges. The score of each vertex is divided evenly among its out-edges. The PageRank-algorithm is called with setIncludeZeroDegreeVertices(true). If vertices got different PageRank-scores, all scores are scaled in a range between 0 and 1. Then it retains all vertices with a PageRank-score greater or equal/smaller than a given sampling threshold - depending on the Boolean set in sampleGreaterThanThreshold. If ALL vertices got the same PageRank-score, it can be decided whether to sample all vertices or none of them - depending on the Boolean set in keepVerticesIfSameScore. Retains all edges which source- and target-vertices were chosen. There may retain some unconnected vertices in the sampled graph.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.sampling.SamplingAlgorithm

    • Constructor Detail

      • PageRankSampling

        public PageRankSampling(double dampeningFactor,
                        int maxIteration,
                        double threshold,
                        boolean sampleGreaterThanThreshold,
                        boolean keepVerticesIfSameScore)
        Creates a new PageRankSampling instance.
        Parameters:
        dampeningFactor - The dampening factor used by PageRank-algorithm, e.g. 0.85
        maxIteration - The number of iterations used by PageRank-algorithm, e.g. 40
        threshold - The threshold for the PageRank-score (ranging between 0 and 1 when scaled), determining if a vertex is sampled, e.g. 0.5
        sampleGreaterThanThreshold - Whether to sample vertices with a PageRank-score greater (true) or equal/smaller (false) the threshold
        keepVerticesIfSameScore - Whether to sample all vertices (true) or none of them (false) in case all vertices got the same PageRank-score.

    • Method Detail

      • sample

        public LogicalGraph sample(LogicalGraph graph)
        Each sampling method should prepare a sample method Vertices are sampled by using the Gradoop-Wrapper of Flinks PageRank-algorithm PageRank. If they got different PageRank-scores, all scores are scaled in a range between 0 and 1. Then all vertices with a PageRank-score greater or equal/smaller than a given sampling threshold are retained - depending on the Boolean set in sampleGreaterThanThreshold. If ALL vertices got the same PageRank-score, it can be decided whether to sample all vertices or none of them - depending on the Boolean set in keepVerticesIfSameScore. Retains all edges which source- and target-vertices were chosen. There may retain some unconnected vertices in the sampled graph.
        Specified by:
        sample in class SamplingAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        graph - graph that will be sampled of
        Returns:
        sampled graph

        Returns the operators name.
